Address.Address1: Pemberton Gardens (Next Or Adjacent To St John Evangelist Church)

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at So Arch Aparthotel in London (Islington), you'll be close to Emirates Stadium and ZSL London Zoo. This 4-star aparthotel is within close proximity of KoKo London and British Library.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 34 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include coffee/tea makers, housekeeping is provided daily, and irons/ironing boards can be requested.

Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 34 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include coffee/tea makers, housekeeping is provided daily, and irons/ironing boards can be requested.

With a stay at So Arch Aparthotel in London (Islington), you'll be close to Emirates Stadium and ZSL London Zoo. This 4-star aparthotel is within close proximity of KoKo London and British Library.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Emirates Stadium - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
KoKo London - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
ZSL London Zoo - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
British Library - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
University of London - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
London Business School - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
Royal Academy of Music - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Lord's Cricket Ground - 4.6 km / 2.8 mi
BT Tower - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Russell Square - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Madame Tussaud's Wax Museum - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
The British Museum - 4.9 km / 3.1 mi
St Georgeâ€™s, Bloomsbury - 5 km / 3.1 mi
London Palladium Theatre - 5.4 km / 3.3 mi
Barbican Arts Centre - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 14.2 km / 8.9 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 24.1 km / 15 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 45.2 km / 28.1 mi
London (STN-Stansted) - 45.4 km / 28.2 mi

The preferred airport for So Arch Aparthotel is London (LCY-London City).

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No date, name and room change allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated.

Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No date, name and room change allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated.

Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No date, name and room change allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated.

Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No date, name and room change allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated.

PLEASE, NOTE THE HOTEL CANNOT BE HELD RESPONSIBLE FOR LOSS, DAMAGE OR THEFT OF CASH, JEWELLERY OR OTHER VALUABLES LEFT UNATTENDED IN GUEST APART/ROOMS. SAFE DEPOSIT BOXES ARE AVAILABLE AT THE FRONT DESK FOR THE SAFEKEEPING OF THESE ITEMS. LOST PROPERTIES: THE HOTEL WILL KEEP LEFT ITEM ON-SITE FOR THE PERIOD OF 2 WEEKS. AFTER THAT TIME IF THE GUEST DO NOT CLAIM THE LEFT PROPERTY IT WILL BE DISPOSED. POR FAVOR, TENGA EN CUENTA QUE EL HOTEL NO PUEDE SER RESPONSABLE POR PERDIDAS,DAÂ¥OS O DINERO EN EFECTIVO ROBADO, JOYERIA U OTROS OBJETOS DE VALOR DESATENDIDOS EN APART/HABITACIONES DE HUESPEDES. HAY CAJAS DE SEGURIDAD DISPONIBLES EN RECEPCION. OBJETOS PERDIDOS: SE GUARDARAN DURANTE 2 SEMANAS Y, SI NO SE RECLAMAN, SERAN DESECHADOS POR EL HOTEL.

Â³ID POLICY: FOR SECURITY PURPOSES, GUEST MUST PROVIDE WITH A PHOTO ID. Â³FRAUD POLICY: THE CREDIT CARD USED TO MAKE THE BOOKING MUST BE PRESENTED AT Â³CHECK IN TO VERIFY IDENTITY, ALONG WITH PHOTO ID. THE CREDIT CARD HOLDER Â³SHOULD BE PRESENT AT CHECK IN TIME. OTHERWISE, A THIRD PARTY CREDIT CARD FORMÂ³SHOULD BE REQUESTED, FILLED AND SENT/EMAILED BACK PRIOR TO GUEST ARRIVAL. THEÂ³HOTEL MAY KINDLY REFUSE CHECK IN WITH NO REFUNDS IF NOT ADHERED. Â³POR RAZONES DE SEGURIDAD, LOS HUESPEDES DEBERAN PRESENTAR UN DOCUMENTO DE Â³IDENTIDAD CON FOTO (PASAPORTE O DNI). Â³EL PROPIETARIO DE LA TARJETA DE CREDITO USADA PARA LA RESERVA DEBERA ESTAR Â³PRESENTE DURANTE EL CHECK IN O RELLENAR UN FORMULARIO EN EL QUE DA SU Â³CONSENTIMIENTO, SI NO LOS HUESPEDES PODRIAN SER RECHADOS SIN REEMBOLSO.

NO SMOKING POLICY THROUGHOUT THEIR APARTMENTS/ROOMS. GUESTS COULD FACE A FIXEDÂ³ PENALTY NOTICE OF 50GBP OR A FINE OF UP TO 250GBP. DESIGNATED SMOKING AREAS Â³ARE MADE AVAILABLE AT EACH SO PROPERTY. Â³NO SE PERMITE FUMAR EN NINGUN APARTAMENTO/HABITACION. LOS HUESPEDES PODRIAN Â³ENFRENTARSE A MULTAS ENTRE 50 Y 250 LIBRAS. TODAS LAS PROPIEDADES DE LA CADENÂ³ SO TIENEN AREAS DISPONIBLES PARA ESTE PROPOSITO.

PARTY POLICY --> HOTEL REGRET TO INFORM THAT RESERVATIONS FOR STAG OR HEN Â³PARTIES WILL NOT BE HONOURED, APARTMENTS/ROOMS WILL BE SUBJECT TO A Â³CANCELLATION WITH NO REFUNDS. Â³SPECIAL REQUESTS --> ARE SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY AND ADDITIONAL CHARGES MAY Â³APPLY. Â³FIESTAS --> EL HOTEL LAMENTA INFORMAR QUE LAS RESERVAS PARA DESPEDIDAS DE Â³SOLTEROS NO ESTAN PERMITIDAS Y QUE LOS APARTAMENTOS/HABITACIONES PODRIAN SER Â³CANCELADOS SIN POSIBILIDAD DE RECIBIR EL REEMBOLSO. Â³PETICIONES ESPECIALES --> ESTAN SUJETAS A DISPONIBILIDAD Y CARGOS ADICIONALESÂ³PODRIAN SER APLICADOS.

SECURITY DEPOSIT: ALL BOOKINGS ARE SUBJECT TO CREDIT CARD PRE-AUTHORIZATION Â³UPON CHECK IN. BOOKINGS MAY BE CANCELLED WITH NO REFUNDS IF NOT ADHERED. THISÂ³DEPOSIT-HOLD IS FULLY REFUNDABLE SUBJECT TO APARTMENT/ROOM INSPECTION UPON Â³CHECK OUT. THE SECURITY CREDIT CARD PRE-AUTHORIZATION CAN ONLY BE RELEASED BYÂ³THE CARDHOLDER'S BANK/CREDIT CARD ISSUING COMPANY - FOR AN IMMEDIATE RELEASE Â³OF THE PRE-AUTHORIZED AMOUNT UPON CHECK OUT, PLEASE REFER TO OUR DETAILED Â³POLICY PAGE LEFT INSIDE YOUR APARTMENT/ROOM OR CONTACT THE FRONT DESK FOR Â³ASSISTANCE. ALL GUESTS MUST SETTLE ROOM/APARTMENT CHARGE IN FULL PRIOR OR UPOÂ³ CHECK OUT.

DEPOSITO DE SEGURIDAD: TODOS LOS CLIENTES TENDRAN QUE APORTAR UNA TARJETA Â³DE CREDITO VALIDA A SU NOMBRE A FIN DE BLOQUEAR UN DEPOSITO EN EL CHECK IN. Â³SI EL CLIENTE NO LA PRESENTASE, SU RESERVA PODRIA SER CANCELADA SIN DERECHO AÂ³REEMBOLSO. ESTE DEPOSITO ESTARA SUJETO A INSPECCION A LA SALIDA DEL CLIENTE. Â³EL DEPOSITO SOLAMENTE PODRA SER DESBLOQUEADO POR EL PROPIETARIO DE LA TARJETAÂ³PARA UN REEMBOSO INMEDIATE DURANTE EL CHECK OUT, CONSULTE LA LISTA DETALLADA Â³QUE SE ENCUENTRA EN SU HABITACION/APARTAMENTO O PREGUNTE EN RECEPCION.

AGE POLICY: ALL GUESTS MUST BE OVER AGE OF 18 TO CHECK IN. FOR ALL UNDER 18, Â³THEY SHOULD BE ACCOMPANIED EITHER BY A GUARDIAN OR A PARENT. Â³POLITICA EDAD: TODOS LOS HUESPEDES DEBEN TENER AL MENOS 18 AÂ¥OS PARA HACER ELÂ³CHECK IN. LOS MENORES DE EDAD DEBERAN ESTAR ACOMPAÂ¥ADOS POR UN GUARDIAN O Â³FAMILIAR.
